casebody.data:
SOMA TECHNOLOGY, INC.
v.
DALAMAGAS, et al. 308A17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 26, 2017 Daniel F.E. Smith, Attorney at Law, Robert J. King, III, Attorney at Law, Jonathan M. Shapiro, Attorney at Law, for Soma Technology, Inc. Sam McGee, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for Desai, Hiren. Paul J. Stevens, Attorney at Law, for Dalamagas, Photios, et al. R. Andrew Murray, District Attorney, for the State of North Carolina

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 25th of September 2017 by Plaintiff:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 26th of September 2017."

Plaintiff shall have up to and including the 15th day of November 2017 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
